Talk_14:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:TalkPositive>The four instruments playing in harmony...
The band leader's funny dancing...

When they're all together, the Stable
Trotters do NOT disappoint!
Talk_15:
<sp:3:0:2:0801>Beetz is back! The band sounds SO good
with his drum putting a little fire into
the rhythm!
Talk_16:
<sp:3:0:2:0801>Eustus is back! <sp:5:0:0>Ah, how I missed the
timbre of his horn...
Talk1001:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseM_01>Aah! You startled me!


<sp:3:0:2:0701>S-sorry... I have <clr:0000>something on my mind<clr:ffff>.
I guess you could say I was spacing out.
Talk_17:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:QuestionNormal>But...<sp:5:0:0>not all of the band members have
come back. There were <clr:0000>five of them<clr:ffff>
before. I wonder what happened.
Talk1002:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Think>You see, this stage is where the Stable
Trotters perform—or used to.

They've been on a break for a while.
Seems like there was some sort
of trouble...
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Sad>The band leader said they were going to
<clr:0000>Woodland Stable <clr:ffff>in Eldin to the northeast,
but they haven't returned since.
I keep wondering when they'll come back.
It's got me so worked up, I can't focus on
my work!
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive>But I have to keep sweeping so when
that day finally comes, the place looks
nice and tidy.
Talk_18:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01>But... The flautist <clr:0000>Pyper<clr:ffff> isn't here.
I wonder what happened to him.
Talk1003:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Ease_00>The <clr:0000>flautist Pyper<clr:ffff>... Could he have
gone to visit my little sister?
Talk_19:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Ease>Hm? Oh, sorry. I was listening to the
band's performance, and I must have
zoned out.
I forgot all about my work. Whoops.


<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:LaughS_00>But, uh, welcome to Outskirt Stable!
If there's something you need, please
ask at the counter.
Talk1004:
<sp:3:0:2:0801>I could listen to Pyper playing his flute
all day long!

It almost makes me forget about cleaning
and all the other boring stuff in my life.
Talk_20:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy>All of the Stable Trotters are here!
Nothing beats the sound of all five of
them making music together.
Talk1005:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseM>I'm not slacking off! <sp:5:0:0>I have <clr:0000>something on
my mind<clr:ffff>, so I can't focus on work.
Talk_21:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>I hear they're touring around the world.<sp:5:0:0>
As we speak, another stable is probably
being graced with their sweet melodies!
<sp:3:0:2:0801>I've gotta make sure this stage is nice and
clean when they come back. The Stable
Trotters deserve nothing less!
Talk1006:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseM_01>Aaah! <sp:5:0:0>You startled me!


Um... <sp:5:0:0>This is Outskirt Stable, and... <sp:5:0:0>Uh...<sp:5:0:0>
Oh wait! I forgot to say welcome!<sp:5:1:0>

<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Sad_01>S-<sp:5:0:0>sorry... <sp:5:0:0>I have <clr:0000>something on my mind<clr:ffff>.
When you came up to me, I panicked.
Talk_22:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive_00>Hey there, traveler! Welcome to
Outskirt Stable.

The Stable Trotters are here right now,
so do yourself a favor and listen to
them perform!
LargeHorse: Will that fit in the stable?
Talk1007:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Think>That stage outside? That's where the
Stable Trotters perform—or used to.
They've been on a break for a while.
It seems like there was some sort
of trouble...<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Sad>The band leader said they were going to
<clr:0000>Woodland Stable <clr:ffff>in Eldin to the northeast,
but they haven't returned since.
I keep wondering when they'll come back.
It's all I can think about!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive>But this place has to be nice and tidy
when the band returns. As soon as the
rain stops, I'll start sweeping!
Talk_23:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Chat>I know I'm supposed to work, but the
music keeps making me lose my train
of thought...
I completely forgot about the cleaning
I was doing.

<sp:3:0:2:0701>But, uh, if you have business at the
stable, please ask at the counter!
Talk_24:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:TalkPositive_01>If you're not in a hurry, why not go over
and listen to the Stable Trotters?

Pyper, the flautist—he's my favorite.


<snd:LaughS_00>The sound of Pyper's flute makes all
your worries melt away.
Talk_25:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:TalkPositive>It's such a treat to have the Stable
Trotters back at our stable! They really
liven up the atmosphere.
Talk_26:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughS>I've got to tidy up so that the performing
area is clean for the Stable Trotters!
Talk_27:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Hey there, and welcome to
Outskirt Stable!

If you want to rest, please consult with
the inn.

<sp:3:0:2:0c00>I wish the Stable Trotters were here to
regale you with their beautiful tunes.

But at the moment, they're off performing
at another stable.
Talk_28:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Welcome to Outskirt Stable!


If you want to rest, please consult with
the inn.

<sp:3:0:2:0c01>I wish the Stable Trotters were here to
regale you with their beautiful tunes.

But at the moment, they're off performing
at another stable.
Talk_29:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01>The only thing is... It sounds like <clr:0000>Pyper<clr:ffff>
isn't performing with them.
Talk_30:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy_01>Pyper, the flautist—he's my favorite.


The sounds of his flute make all your
worries melt away.
Talk_31:
<sp:3:0:2:0100>But I guess I'll take a break until the rain
lets up. <sp:5:0:0>You're welcome to join me!
Talk_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>He's a precocious, young <clr:0000>flautist<clr:ffff>.


<sp:3:0:2:0801>When I heard the sweet sounds of his
flute, I felt transported. All my worries
melted away...
Pyper was the best part of the band,
if you ask me!

<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Think>Without him, the Stable Trotters just
aren't complete.

You know, he and my little sister <clr:0000>Haite<clr:ffff>
are close. Maybe he followed her to
<clr:0000>Highland Stable<clr:ffff>.
Then again, that stable is a good distance
away—on the <clr:0000>southern edge <clr:ffff>of Hyrule.
So probably not.
<sp:3:0:2:0501><snd:Ease>Listen to me. <sp:5:0:0>I think about this stuff so
much, I can hardly focus on work.
Talk_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01>Come to think of it, a customer told me
something odd the other day.

They were in southeast Hyrule, <clr:0000>traveling
from <clr:ffff>Kakariko Village to Dueling Peaks
Stable, and they heard a drum beat.
I wonder...
Talk_04:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01>You know... This reminds me of something
a customer from <clr:0000>Hebra<clr:ffff> told me.

They heard the sound of a horn while
<clr:0000>traveling from <clr:ffff>Tabantha Bridge Stable to
Rito Village.
Could it be...
Talk_05:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:TalkPositive>Right! <sp:5:0:0>I'll make sure this place is sparkly
clean when they come back.
Talk_06:
<sp:3:0:2:0801>You picked a great time to listen in.
Please take it easy, and let the music
wash over you.
Make sure to listen for Pyper—he's
my favorite.

<snd:LaughS_00>The sound of Pyper's flute makes all
your worries melt away.
Talk_08:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy>Did you hear? The Stable Trotters are
back together! And thanks to yours truly,
they have a nice, tidy stage to play on.
Talk_09:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy>Pyper is back! I finally get to hear him
play again...
Talk_10:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive_00>Good morning! Nothing like a little music
first thing, huh? Wakes you right up!
Talk_11:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Greeting_00>Hello! Nothing like a little music to keep
you energized, huh?
Talk_12:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive_01>Good evening! I hope you're enjoying this
lovely music. Feel free to rest at our inn.
Talk_13: <sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:SurpriseL>Ack! Wet! I gotta take cover in the stable!
